lead_paragraph: Two large barns in this city, filled with oats and hay, were burned down by the act of an incendiary this morning. A half-witted fellow has been arrested on suspicion of having kindled the fire. Three of our best steamers, the Mayflower, Caspian and Buckeye, had a splendid race to Cleveland last night.
